Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2500 WINDY RIDGE PARKWAY SE, ATLANTA, Georgia, 30339, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Floor & Decor Holdings Inc operates as a specialty retailer in the hard surface flooring market. Its stores offer a range of tile, wood, laminate, and natural stone flooring products, as well as decorative and installation accessories at everyday low prices. It appeals to a variety of customers including professional installers, commercial businesses, Do It Yourself (DIY) customers, and customers who buy the products for professional installation. Geographically, the group has its presence in the US region and also offers its product through an e-commerce site.
